Description:
Pleasant charm with family proportions.
Graced with a beguiling front verandah and delightful established garden, this character weatherboard home establishes a feeling of timeless warmth and cohesion and offers the family generous proportions to enjoy.
Once inside this endearing abode, the interior presents a calm oasis of neutral tones coupled with soothing timber flooring, standing as a testimony to its enduring quality, as well as conveying a charming sense of simplicity with thanks to the smart layout.
The comfortable and inviting lounge places a focus on the open fireplace and bold feature wall while a series of large windows allow sunlight to pour into the room, providing a beautiful atmosphere to relax with family and guests. Only a timeless beauty such as this can give off an air of homeliness and history, yet modern enhancements have been delicately woven into its fabric.
Be ready to be wowed. The sparkling contemporary kitchen showcases a stainless steel 900mm cooker, dishwasher, large island bench, soft-close drawers, pantry with drawers, corner carousel, breakfast bar and wine rack. To finish off, the interplay between the dark granite benchtops and white cabinetry result in a stunning effect. The adjoining dining area features a box bay window and floating floor, opening out to a huge alfresco through double glass doors-an appreciable space designed to create meaningful memories for years to come.
Back inside, the master affords a private escape for parents, boasting direct access to the alfresco in addition to a walk-in robe, ceiling fan and full ensuite featuring a walk-in shower with glass brick screen. Two of the three additional bedrooms are robed and all share a tiled bathroom comprising a shower and spa.
The spacious laundry is equipped to make household chores a breeze, boasting ample cupboard and bench space. Other inclusions are; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceiling, shed/workshop and double carport. Bi-fold doors separate the study from the dining room and can be opened up to create a sense of flow. A lot of work has been completed but there's still plenty of scope to add your own style by taking the home to the next level or simply enjoy as is.
Set on a generous 779m2 (approx.) block, this property is located just a short stroll from Heathmont Village (730 metres approx.), H.E. Parker Reserve with playground and tennis courts, Heathmont Railway Station, Heathmont East Preschool, Heathmont East Primary School, BMX track, Heathmont Bowling Club, as well as being in close proximity to EastLink freeway, Aquinas College, Tintern Grammar and Aquanation.
Defined by cosy and comfortable family living, this delightful house is ready to be appreciated.

A Haven of Peace in the Tintern Precinct
Come home to a haven of peace and harmony, with this beautifully updated residence resting at the bowl of a prized Tintern precinct court. Picturesquely poised amid lush green gardens, it showcases perfectly presented indoor and outdoor expanses, aligned for modern family enjoyment.
Fresh paint, contemporary flooring and full-length window sunlight highlight its free-flowing floorplan, where an expansive open living and dining domain with Mt Dandenong Ranges views takes centre stage.
A striking kitchen creates distinction between the zones; containing stainless steel appliances plus generous cabinetry, meal preparation and breakfast bar space.
A trio of sliding doors supply a seamless transition outside, where crazy paved pathways weave around the home and complement a large entertaining deck with covered area for barbequing.
Comfortably accommodating, three robed bedrooms plus a study/fourth bedroom are serviced by a bright central bathroom and separate toilet. The master containing a walk-in closet and matching-style en-suite.
Ducted heating and vacuum, split system air conditioning, LED downlights, generous storage, a water tank and double carport further enhance this home's immense appeal, as does its superb family-focused location. Situated within walking distance to buses, Gracedale Park and Tennis Club, Tarralla Kindergarten, Tinternvale Primary School and Tintern Grammar. Only a short commute to Heathmont East Primary School, the vibrant shopping villages and train stations of Ringwood East and Heathmont, Eastland and EastLink.
* Beautifully updated family home in a peaceful Tintern precinct court
* Expansive open living and dining room with Mt Dandenong Ranges views
* Contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances
* Three robed bedrooms, a study/fourth bedroom and two matching-style bathrooms
* Large entertaining deck with covered area for barbequing
* Ducted heating and vacuum, split system air conditioning

* Moments from parks, trails, buses, quality schools, shops and train stations
